TopicTitle: VAB issues--symmetry, unable to throw parts away, cannot launch etc.

Articles.Content:
This was not meant to be a laundry list, but the VAB has been a nightmare this evening.  Here is a video of me trying to build this rocket.

 

1. I cannot trash a part--notice a part is always stuck to the cursor

2. The struts will not attach

3. I cannot launch

4. Notice the weird issue with the nose cones

5. Not shown in video, but I had a subassembly that I tried attaching to a radial attachment point. When I tried attaching it, it scrambled all the parts into weird angles. I had to dismantle it and start over.

6. Also not shown: earlier, when trying to attach the struts to the nose cones, I got 8x symmetry on each nose cone (as opposed to 8 x for just the whole craft).

 

I then tried to exit the game after saving and restart.  Not only did the problems persist, but my ship reverted to an earlier save (which is what you see here).  I've uploaded the files to Google Drive:

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Nc6clJgnKzK96sQV3XODBqqRFZqbYuvm?usp=share_link

 

 

 

 

Edited April 16, 2023 by Klapaucius
